__e: I'm taking you back to your mother-in-law's fortress until I can figure out who that was.
You must take that risk, my son, for the sake of Fire Keep.
The fortress is not too far away, we must leave now.
The Lord is my shelter and my fortress and my God in whom I trust.
This is our Fortress, and those people are trusting us and... put their hopes on us.
If we enter, she threatens to light a flint and blow up the rocca with all of us inside.
